headline: Norway Cards and Payments Market Opportunity and Risks Analysis Report 2025-2029: Cross-Nordic Transfers Simplified by Vipps with Visa Direct and Mastercard Send
summary: Key opportunities in Norway's cards and payments market include the implementation of the NBO INST real-time payment service, expansion of Vipps NFC beyond Apple Pay for contactless payment solutions, and a new cross-border card-based transfer service with Visa and Mastercard. These developments drive innovation and consumer convenience in the sector.Dublin, Nov. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Norway Cards and Payments: Opportunities and Risks to 2029" report has been added to ResearchAndMark
